articles.title: Michael K Williams: Drug dealer pleads guilty over The Wire actor's death - BBC
articles.description: A man sold the fentanyl-laced heroin in New York which killed The Wire actor, US court hears.
articles.content:
A man has pleaded guilty in court to distributing the fentanyl-laced heroin that resulted in the death of The Wire's Michael K Williams in 2021.
Irvin Cartagena, also known as Green Eyes, sold the d… [+2674 chars]

articles.title: Jack Black CONFIRMS the cast of School Of Rock will reunite in honor of 20th anniversary - Daily Mail
articles.description: Black has long considered School Of Rock to be the 'highlight' of his decades-long career in Hollywood.
articles.content:
Jack Black has confirmed that he will reunite with his School Of Rock co-stars in honor of the film's 20th anniversary.
